author: jfaath
msg: JUDDI-140, JUDDI-138:  lots of work on validating user input and returning the appropriate error.  Implemented messages that can be internationalized.

author: tross
msg: 1) Locking was added to protect the exchange's vector of bridges.
2) Bridges are now properly torn down when a link is lost.
3) Auto-tracing was improperly assigning tags to federation queues.
Also, the federation queue name now uses the broker-id for the destination
broker.  This makes it easier to determine which queues go to which

author: bodewig
msg: This is what I wanted to write.
